Job Description:
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (Linux,  Apache,  MySQL,  PHP) Job Description: 
Must have hands on experience on PHP,  MYSQL,  Joomla.
Should have worked on HTML,  CSS,  Java Scripts,  Ajax and XML.
Proficient in CMS,  Ecommerce,  Dynamic websites.
Payment Gateway Integration is a must.
Add ons -  Open Source Technology,  Drupal.
Knowledge and ability to handle the full project life cycle.
Experience: 1 to 3 years
